data.comment: The match has started.
Man City's Riyad Mahrez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 1, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Man City territory.
In the minute 7, Sergio Aguero (Man City) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Manchester.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Man City.
Man City drive upfield and Phil Foden gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Man City.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Man City throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Rodri (Man City) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 16, In Manchester, Raheem Sterling of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 21, Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Man City drives forward and Phil Foden gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 23, Raheem Sterling is on target to give Man City a 1-0 advantage.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Man City.
Bukayo Saka for Arsenal drives towards goal at Etihad Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Arsenal push forward at Etihad Stadium and Kieran Tierney gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man City defence.
Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 26, Chris Kavanagh awards Man City a goal kick.
Riyad Mahrez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man City.
Riyad Mahrez (Man City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 28, Man City have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 33, Man City to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Riyad Mahrez for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Etihad Stadium.
In the minute 35, Man City's Phil Foden is on target but unsuccessful.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Man City in the half of Arsenal.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man City's half?
In the minute 40, Arsenal pushes forward through Bukayo Saka, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
In the minute 41, Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has run offside.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a Man City throw-in in Arsenal's half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
The first-half is over at Etihad Stadium.
Chris Kavanagh has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Nicolas Pepe of Arsenal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Attention is being given to Arsenalâ€™s Nicolas Pepe and play has been suspended briefly.
Arsenal's Nicolas Pepe is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Arsenal at Etihad Stadium.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In the minute 51, Arsenal are pushing forward but Kieran Tierney's finish is wide of the goal.
Man City have a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh awards Man City a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Man City needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
In Manchester Man City drive forward through Riyad Mahrez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
In the minute 60, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Man City.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 62, Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal.
Joao Cancelo is booked for the home team.
In the minute 64, Important block from the Man City defence as David Luiz fires in a strike for Arsenal.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 65, Ilkay Gundogan is on a sub for Sergio Aguero for Man City.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chris Kavanagh signals a free kick to Arsenal just outside Man City's area.
In the minute 68, At Etihad Stadium, Ruben Dias has been yellow-carded for the home team.
David Luiz of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
In the minute 69, Alexandre Lacazette is replacing Willian for the away team.
Throw-in for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Man City at Etihad Stadium.
Corner awarded to Man City.
Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 77, Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Manchester.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Chris Kavanagh.
In Manchester Man City attack through Riyad Mahrez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 78, Chris Kavanagh awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Chris Kavanagh awards the home team a throw-in.
Man City's Phil Foden gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
In the minute 81, Man City will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Arsenal.
